amendment.description: To make the provisions of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 permanent.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2626 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S1649-1655, S1655; text: CR S1650) To make the provisions of the Voting Rights Act of 1965 permanent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Frist.
